pages.text: PneumaticCraft: Repressurized brings pneumatics to Minecraft with advanced machinery powered by compressed air. $(br2)Automate tasks, mine resources, and build intricate machines using air pressure.
Start by crafting an Air Compressor to generate compressed air. $(br2)Store air in Pressure Tubes and Pressure Chambers, and use it to power machines like the Assembly System and Drone.
Upgrade your system with Vortex Tubes for cooling, or use the Programmable Controller to automate complex processes. $(br2)Create efficient automation networks using Drones and the Charging Station.

Note: The Compressed Creativity mod is included in this pack, providing Create mod compatibility. $(br2)Integrate PneumaticCraft's air-powered machinery with Create's contraptions for even more automation possibilities!
